      public boolean userInnDB(String usrNmOrMail)

      Parameters:

      Returns:

    • checkUser

      public boolean checkUser(String usrnmOrMail, String password)
      A method to check the user, checks if inn database and if the password matches
      Parameters:
      usrnmOrMail - The username of the user as a String
      password - The password (not hashed) of the user as a String
      Returns:
      true if both password and username match

    • hashPassword

      public String hashPassword(String password)
      Hashes a password
      Parameters:

      Returns:
      a hashed password as a String

    • register

      public boolean register(String username, String password, String email)
      A method to register/insert a new user into the database
      Parameters:
      username - The username of the new user as a String
      password - The password (not hashed) of the new user as a String
      email - The email of the new user as a String
      Returns:
      True if the registration/insertion is successful

    • remove

      public boolean remove(String usrnmOrMail, String password) throws SQLException
      A method to remove a user from the database
      Parameters:
      usrnmOrMail - The username or email of the user to be removed as a String
      password - The password of the user to be removed as a String
      Returns:
      True if the removal is successful
      Throws:
      SQLException - - if it fails

      The amount of entries in users database

      A method to remove a tournament from database
      Parameters:
      userName - the username of the creator of the tournament
      Returns:
      true if successfully removed
